The sample material (saline water (ENVO:00002010), including plankton (ENVO:xxxxxxxx)) was collected at a depth of 596-605 m, targeting a mesopelagic zone (ENVO:00000213) & marine oxygen minimum zone (ENVO:01000065) in the marine biome (ENVO:00000447). The sample was size-fractionated (0.1-0.22 micrometres), and stored at -20 degC for later detection of large DNA virus nucleic acid sequences by pyrosequencing methods, and for later metagenomics analysis."
